item.title: How to Replace Hugo Theme
item.description: Go to github page of the new theme that you want to replace (in my case it is cactus theme) Run this command in root folder of your website to download the theme: git submodule add https://github.com/digitalcraftsman/hugo-cactus-theme.git themes/cactus Replace your config.toml file with new theme’s config.toml file In the new config.toml file, change the value of ‘theme’ parameter to your theme folder name (in this case it should be theme=“cactus”) Run this command in root folder to see your changes: hugo serve Check your localhost webpage to see changes and you are done.
